content: Yes, the Carris/Metro app has an English language option for non-Portuguese speakers, making it easy to use and navigate. Additionally, the app has a user-friendly interface with intuitive icons and symbols, making it easy to understand the different modes of transportation and their routes. The app also provides clear and accurate information on schedules, stops, and prices, helping users make informed decisions about their travel plans. Overall, the app is a helpful tool for tourists and locals alike to navigate the public transportation system in the greater Lisbon area.
